title: What are some hospitality trends? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are the trends in hospitality industry? What trends are U talking ‘bout, long term? With the Covid-19 pandemic ravaging the econ, more so on the hospitality industry, a substantially no. of the hospitality bizs will be dead before the Covid-19 is over? A sizeable no. will require rescue e.g. Qatar Airways just got a “package fund” from the Qatari govt, while many under-funded resorts will soon turn into dilapidated buildings as repairs & maint need $$$, and there’s not even enough $$$ to pay wages? It’s kinda sad as at present, it’s difficult to do long-term forecast as short-term survival is at stake? 😭

Any hotel who needs to be successful needs to be one step ahead of the competition & be innovative. The new trends include home delivery service, laundry service on pick up & drop from & to hotel, coworkers in hotels, flexibility in check & check out timings, cancellation policies, change in the way the rooms, public areas are designed, F&B has a great deal of emerging trends as todays customer is looking for newer cuisines & trendy food.
